title: BETLL01
author: BETLL01
content: Hi all,I'm selling UK Bet365 with customized options.I used to sell my account to courtsiders, but as you may know courtsiding is getting hard these days, so I'm looking for new customers.I can make accounts with following options -Deposit - I can provide you an account with a payment method, or you can use your own payment methodPayment method - Paysafecard, Bank account or CardAddress - You can choose a city/address you want so it corresponds to your IP addressPVC - We can verify the account with PVC (Postal Verification Code) if neededWe will use real UK/EU IDs to verify the account, instead of some Bangladesh/India IDs that's common on the market.Besides UK Bet365 account, I also provide following services -Account in another country - I can create accounts in other countries if neededOther accounts - e.g. Betfair, Paddy Power, William Hill, etc.Unfroze accounts - If you have money frozen on an account, I can help you unfroze the account and get the money back.I can provide vouch from my customers, and I will be happy to work with escrow if needed, so both of us will not be scammed.The price for different services is different, you can contact me to find out more.TG: BETLL01
